alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 2:00AM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Light snow will start later today with heavy snow possible above 7000 feet Tuesday. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches possible. Southwest winds could gust between 45 and 55 mph with 60 mph possible on the ridges. * WHERE...Spring Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 PM today to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. *PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&
